subScenes.name: 会议开场
subScenes.description: 主持人引导会议，询问与会者意见

qaPairs.speakerText: Alright everyone, let's kick off—what do you think about this quarter's marketing push?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 好了各位，我们开始吧——你们对本季度的营销推广有什么看法？

responses.text: I'd say we should focus more on social media ads—they're driving most of our leads lately.
responses.text_cn: 我觉得应该更侧重社交媒体广告，最近它们带来了大部分潜在客户。

responses.text: Hmm, I'm not sure—maybe we could test both digital and traditional channels?
responses.text_cn: 嗯，我不太确定，也许我们可以同时测试数字和传统渠道？

responses.text: Sounds good to me.
responses.text_cn: 我觉得不错。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体数据支持观点，避免空泛评价

qaPairs.speakerText: Sarah, you've been handling the client feedback—any trends you've noticed?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: Sarah，你一直在处理客户反馈，有什么发现吗？

responses.text: Yeah, over 60% of complaints are about slow response times—we need to fix that ASAP.
responses.text_cn: 是的，超过60%的投诉是关于响应慢的，我们得尽快解决。

responses.text: I've seen a few patterns, but I'd need to pull the full report first.
responses.text_cn: 我注意到一些模式，但得先调出完整报告。

responses.text: Not sure yet.
responses.text_cn: 还不确定。

qaPairs.usageNote: 若数据未准备，可委婉请求时间

subScenes.name: 观点碰撞
subScenes.description: 成员对预算分配产生分歧，展开讨论

qaPairs.speakerText: I think we should cut the print ads—no one reads magazines anymore.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我觉得该砍掉印刷广告，没人看杂志了。

responses.text: I get your point, but print still works well with our older customers—what if we reduce it by 30% instead?
responses.text_cn: 我明白你的意思，但印刷广告对老年客户仍有效，能否先减30%？

responses.text: Totally agree—let’s scrap it and reallocate the budget.
responses.text_cn: 完全同意，直接砍掉，把预算挪走。

responses.text: Maybe.
responses.text_cn: 也许吧。

qaPairs.usageNote: 提出折中方案，避免直接否定他人

qaPairs.speakerText: But if we cut print too much, we’ll lose brand credibility in rural areas.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 但如果砍太多印刷广告，我们在农村地区的品牌信誉会受损。

responses.text: Fair point—I hadn’t considered that. How about keeping just 10 local inserts?
responses.text_cn: 有道理，我没想到这点。保留10份地方简报如何？

responses.text: Then let’s keep the full budget—better safe than sorry.
responses.text_cn: 那我们就保留全部预算，安全第一。

responses.text: Yeah, true.
responses.text_cn: 嗯，确实。

qaPairs.usageNote: 认可对方后，立即给出替代方案

subScenes.name: 确认任务
subScenes.description: 明确分工与截止时间，确保执行落地

qaPairs.speakerText: So, Alex, you’ll handle the social media overhaul by Friday?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 所以，Alex，你负责在周五前完成社交媒体全面更新？

responses.text: Yep, I’ll send you the draft by Thursday EOD and get design team input.
responses.text_cn: 没问题，我周四下班前发初稿，再找设计团队确认。

responses.text: I can do it, but I’ll need Lisa’s help with the copy—can you loop her in?
responses.text_cn: 我可以做，但需要Lisa帮忙写文案，你能拉她进群吗？

responses.text: I’ll try.
responses.text_cn: 我试试看。

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认任务时，必须包含时间点和协作需求

qaPairs.speakerText: And who’s taking care of the Q3 report? It’s due Monday.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 那Q3报告谁负责？周一就要交。

responses.text: I’ll take it—I’ve already got the data. I’ll share the template by tomorrow.
responses.text_cn: 我来负责，数据我都有了，明天发模板给你。

responses.text: I’m swamped this week—can someone else take it?
responses.text_cn: 我这周忙不过来，有人能接手吗？

responses.text: Monday? Okay.
responses.text_cn: 周一？行。

qaPairs.usageNote: 若无法承担，应主动提议替代方案

subScenes.name: 会议收尾
subScenes.description: 总结结论，感谢参与，结束会议

qaPairs.speakerText: Alright, to recap—we’re cutting print by 30%, keeping local inserts, Alex handles social by Fri, and Jamie owns the Q3 report. Sound good?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 好了，总结一下：印刷广告减30%，保留地方简报，Alex周五前搞定社交媒体，Jamie负责Q3报告。大家同意吗？

responses.text: Perfect—thanks for clarifying. I’ll update the tracker right away.
responses.text_cn: 太好了，谢谢明确分工，我马上更新任务表。

responses.text: Sounds good to me.
responses.text_cn: 我同意。

responses.text: Just one thing—can we add a mid-week check-in?
responses.text_cn: 就一点，我们能加个周中检查吗？

qaPairs.usageNote: 同意时可补充细节，体现主动性

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks, everyone—your input really helped shape this plan.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 谢谢大家，你们的建议对完善计划帮助很大。

responses.text: No problem—I’m glad we could align on this.
responses.text_cn: 不客气，很高兴我们达成一致了。

responses.text: Thanks for leading this, Sarah!
responses.text_cn: 谢谢你带会议，Sarah！

responses.text: See you Monday.
responses.text_cn: 周一见。

qaPairs.usageNote: 回应感谢时，可表达对主持人的认可
